TopicTitle: The Return of space lift project.

Articles.Content: The video is kinda self explanatory. http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/michaellaine/space-elevator-science-climb-to-the-sky-a-tethered?ref=discover_pop
That's pretty cool, with help I think they could do it but I can imagine it being an extremely complicated project to achieve
One of my friends describes kickstarter as a sort of open-access voluntary fraud operation. I begin to see what he means. . .
